mapper.insert: insert into oa_news_release (fid, fnewstitle, freleasedepartment, fpeople, ftime, fnewsnumber, freleaseconnext, fstate, fsettopwhether, fsettoptime, fsetendtime, faccessories, fcolumnname, ftype, version, sminipic) values (#{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnewstitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freleasedepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fnewsnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freleaseconnext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsettopwhether,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsettoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fsetendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{faccessories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcolumnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sminipic,jdbcType=BINARY})
mapper.update: update oa_news_release set fnewstitle = #{fnewstitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freleasedepartment = #{freleasedepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fpeople = #{fpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftime = #{ftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fnewsnumber = #{fnewsnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freleaseconnext = #{freleaseconnext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fstate = #{fstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsettopwhether = #{fsettopwhether,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsettoptime = #{fsettoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fsetendtime = #{fsetendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, faccessories = #{faccessories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcolumnname = #{fcolumnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sminipic = #{sminipic,jdbcType=BINARY} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select fid, fnewstitle, freleasedepartment, fpeople, ftime, fnewsnumber, freleaseconnext, fstate, fsettopwhether, fsettoptime, fsetendtime, faccessories, fcolumnname, ftype, version, sminipic from oa_news_release where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select fid, fnewstitle, freleasedepartment, fpeople, ftime, fnewsnumber, freleaseconnext, fstate, fsettopwhether, fsettoptime, fsetendtime, faccessories, fcolumnname, ftype, version, sminipic from oa_news_release
